definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: denom. count as foreskin, i.e. as uncircumcised;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl., c. acc. cogn. [[וַעֲרַלְתֶּם עָרְלָתוֹ]] Le 19:23 ye shall regard its fruit as uncircumcised, and not eat it (for three years) (> SS remove its foreskin (its fruit), as Vulgate, cf. LXX perikaqariei=te th\n a)kaqapsi/an a/)tou=).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Imv. [[הֵעָרֵל]] Hb Hab 2:16 be counted uncircumcised, i.e. be object of mockery; but dub., read probably [[הֵרָעֵל]] reel (LXX SyrVer We Now Buhl:Lex).
